tool_description: Derives hierarchical deterministic wallet keys and addresses using BIP32/BIP44 standards from seed phrases or master private keys, supporting multiple derivation paths and blockchain networks.

seed_source.description: Seed phrase or master private key for derivation

source_type.description: Type of seed source: mnemonic or master_key

blockchain_type.description: Target blockchain: bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash

error_messages: Invalid source type: Must be either 'mnemonic' or 'master_key'.
Invalid derivation path: Path must follow BIP32 format (e.g., m/44'/0'/0'/0/0).
Unsupported blockchain: Use one of [bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash].
Account index out of range: Must be between 0 and 2147483647.
Address count exceeded: Can derive maximum 100 addresses per request.
Derivation failed: Unable to derive keys from provided seed source.
usage: Provide seed_source, source_type, derivation_path, and blockchain_type. Optionally set account_index, address_count, change_addresses, and passphrase for customized derivation.

master_public_key.description: Master public key for the derivation path

derivation_paths.description: Array of full derivation paths used
